wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-14：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-09-29：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL盲注，将会泄露江西省教师的各种信息 详细说明：  http://data.jxteacher.com/search/江西省教师信息查询页面存在POST型SQL注入漏洞，其POST请求详细信息如下，其中txtKeyword参数存在字符型SQL盲注POST /search/ HTTP/1.1Host: data.jxteacher.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:28.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/28.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://data.jxteacher.com/search/Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=giuegcqmmdlnbk0hbvgtfmc5Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 907__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUJNDgwNDI3NjI4D2QWAgIDD2QWAgIJDzwrABEDAA8WBB4LXyFEYXRhQm91bmRnHgtfIUl0ZW1Db3VudAIBZAEQFgAWABYADBQrAAAWAmYPZBYEAgEPZBYKZg9kFgICAQ8PFgQeC05hdmlnYXRlVXJsBTZ2aWV3Y2VydHMuYXNweD9pZD04ZjY0NTVhZC05NGE4LTQ2ODUtYjcyNy1jNDUwYzFhMTRhZGIeBFRleHQFEjM2MDk4MzAwNDAwMjExMDE0MGRkAgEPDxYCHwMFCeWRqOWwj%2Bm%2BmWRkAgIPDxYCHwMFPOWunOaYpeW4guOAi%2BmrmOWuieW4guOAi%2Baxn%2Bilv%2BWunOaYpemrmOWuieefs%2BiEkeS4reW%2Fg%2BWwj%2BWtpmRkAgMPDxYCHwMFBuWwj%2BWtpmRkAgQPDxYCHwMFDOWwj%2BWtpuaVsOWtpmRkAgIPDxYCHgdWaXNpYmxlaGRkGAEFCWd2VGVhY2hlcg88KwAMAQgCAWQ7AtcmIAqx%2BZdTvnoO0j67egq9YuZ4enssaRHRF0bVnQ%3D%3D&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEdAAdIqOPyeTUZX9yNHhBPhKCkPYhyekUWnTkkNjRCzj%2B13syRwqaaMbxXVBTc8MQF49fKA14KXQyGcaU%2Bic2XSmnAVhW2Dx14E2vTrCPjioKTT7rZiRCqc8WDJESCLLHi21qO1N1XNFmfsMXJasjxX85jx5SpVJ15nuoYXwTKbT1TzsZUeGz0KgFWz%2FPZVVhzQmU%3D&ddlSearchType=5&txtKeyword=360983004002110013&btnSearch=%E6%9F%A5%E6%89%BE采用sqlmap进行检测的结果
